text: @CNBC Why do we believe these assholes? Florida numbers of deaths are way down?Bull! The state is not counting All Coronavirus deaths as such.They are counting the deaths as pneumonia! Fuck these people. They should be jailed. Are we going to die so drinks, addicts and pedophiles win?
